mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_sys_attach_business
ATTACH_ID = #{attachId},
BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId},
BUSINESS_TABLE = #{businessTable},
BUSINESS_SOURCE = #{businessSource},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
where ID = #{id}
